mapper.select: select ui.user_id userId, ui.user_name userName,ac.aval_amount avalAmount,ac.aval_amount*ac.rate cnstAmount from T_ACCT_INFO ac LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO ui on ac.user_id=ui.user_id where ui.status=#{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and ac.aval_amount>0
select u.user_name recommUserName, rr.create_time createTime from T_RECOMM_REL_INFO rr LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO u on rr.recomm_user_id=u.user_id where rr.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
